about_the_game:
Unknown reasons cause the world to collapse, and the remaining people restore order.
Rebuild civilization in the waste soil and look for the past in the debris.
Magic brings a turn for the better, magic brings everything.

"RealmLess" is a 3D third-person perspective, combat based on the action system of the classic Roguelike game.

-Battle: skill release, movement control, dodge, counterattack, position, do whatever it takes to defeat the enemy.
-Combo, control

-Defense, dodge

-Random: completely random in a 3D scene, the terrain, time, enemies, and even flowers and plants of each game will change.
-the scene time will also change.


-skills: more than 100 skills can be used, and there will be more in the future.
-Construction: skills and skills combination, reasonable matching will become stronger.
-Synthesis: skills can be transformed and upgraded through the synthesizer, and even become other skills.

Demo version Information:
This Demo test is used to verify the basic methods and operations of the game, which is somewhat different from the official version.
After closing the game, most of the settings and unlock items will not be retained.
Demo version is not stable, if you encounter Bug, you can give us feedback directly.

The Demo version contains:
A complete combat system.
The map of the first three floors and some creatures.
About 50 active skills, as well as a small amount of Passive Skill.
Talent tree system.
Material cultivation system.
Mission system (part).



The official version will be added:
Add more than 100 skills, including active skills and Passive Skill.
A complete map of all levels and corresponding types of enemies.
Difficulty selection function and score settlement.
Mainline and feeder tasks.
More skills unlock.
Plot content.
Hidden rooms and skills that require unlocking.
English support (currently mainly supports Chinese).
And other additional games, such as big map puzzles.

name: RealmLess

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3/Amd Ryzen3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750/R7 360
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5/Amd Ryzen5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060/R9 380
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Unknown reasons cause the world to collapse, and the remaining people restore order. Rebuild civilization in the waste soil and look for the past in the debris. Magic brings a turn for the better, magic brings everything.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, Korean
